sentences.en: His favorite book was the Koran, so on occasion he would entertain those who would ask by reciting the Koran word for word.

sentences.en: His professor forced him to learn every line of the Koran.

sentences.en: I had learnt a portion of the Koran.

sentences.en: Regarded as literature or philosophy the Koran is certainly unworthy of its alleged Divine authorship.
